divs: Sighting DetailsThe more I think about this, the more I keep telling myself it had to be a satellite although I have my doubts. At approx. 10:26 PM while relaxing and stargazing, I noticed a bright white light in the southern sky traveling north. It was way, way up in the sky moving a rapid pace. It took about a minute to dissapear into the light poluted skys above Carson City, NV. A few moments later another one, and then one more. all traveling the same direction but in different parts of the sky. I'm certain it was no falling star. They had a definate course heading. I've always been lead to believe that you may catch a satelite in the sky but 3 all in a matter of a few minutes ?
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Minden
There were no other sightings in Minden on or around August 8th 2008
